page.title: 06TOP FARM L.BARFORD - Crops
page.content: The crops are grown in rotation.{ {Rape}is sown at the end of August to early September,and is in for near enough a year.It has been grown at{Top {Farm}for five years.{Winter Wheat}and Winter Barley are called that because they are sown in those months.{Oil {Seed Rape}leaves nitrogen behind so it is a good crop to grow.It is used in Hydraulic oil as well as vegetable oil.There are only four men working on the estate full time throughout the year,three extra when harvest and cultivation time comes round.{
